home.rank.title: WITHDRAWAL CHARTER
home.course.title: How to bet
home.course.step1.des: You can choose to play 1 minute, 3 minute, 5 minute and 10 minute Blockchain games
home.course.step2.des: Choose your lucky number or color
home.course.step3.des: Choose the amount you want to bet and confirm.
home.course.step4.des: When you choose a lucky number for the current period, the system will automatically add the bonus to your balance
lottery.title: Lottery
lottery.k3.type2.text1.rule: If the winning number matches the 2 betting numbers, it is a win. (Except for three identical numbers)
lottery.k3.type2.text2: Choose a pair of unique numbers
lottery.k3.type2.text2.rule: Choose at least 2 identical numbers and 1 different number to place a bet. If the lottery number matches the betting number, it is a win.
lottery.k3.type3.text1.rule: If the lottery number matches 3 betting numbers, it is a win
lottery.k3.type3.text2.rule: If the lottery number is the same as any three numbers, it is a winning
lottery.k3.type4.text1.rule: Choose 3 or more numbers, the results of the three numbers will be different numbers, if the number is the same as the selected number, it will be a winner
lottery.k3.type4.text2.rule: If the lottery number is any one of three consecutive numbers, it is the winning result.
lottery.k3.type4.text3.rule: Choose 2 or more numbers, the results of the two numbers are different, if the number is the same as the selected number, it will be a winner

transfer.title: How to transfer money to others?
tansfer.strep1: Step 1: Enter the other party's mobile phone number, transfer amount, verify OTP, and initiate the transfer.
tansfer.strep2: Step 2: Notify the payee to confirm.
tansfer.strep3: Step 3: Tell the payee the payment code.
tansfer.strep4: Step 4: The payee enters the payment code, and the transaction is completed.
tansfer.canclestrep1: You can cancel the transaction without confirmation from the payee
tansfer.canclestrep2: After the payee confirms, only the payee can cancel the transaction
tansfer.canclestrep3: After entering the payment code, the transaction cannot be canceled
